crops.name: Strawberries
crops.protection: Netting against birds, straw mulch to protect fruit
crops.tips: Remove runners unless propagating, feed high potash when fruiting

crops.name: Raspberries
crops.depth: Plant canes at same depth as nursery
crops.where: Raised beds, direct soil with supports
crops.tips: Tie canes to wires, prune depending on summer/autumn type
crops.notes: Divide between summer-fruiting and autumn-fruiting types

crops.name: Blackberries
crops.depth: Plant at same level as pot
crops.where: Soil, trained against fence or trellis
crops.tips: Prune old canes after fruiting, tie in new growth

crops.name: Gooseberries
crops.depth: Plant at same depth as pot
crops.tips: Prune to open centre, harvest underripe for cooking
crops.notes: Can be grown as standards or bushes

crops.name: Blueberries
crops.depth: Plant at same level as pot
crops.tips: Use rainwater for watering, grow two varieties for pollination
crops.notes: Acidic soil required; best in pots in alkaline areas

crops.name: Currants (Red, Black, White)
crops.depth: Plant at same level as nursery pot
crops.protection: Net to protect berries from birds
crops.tips: Prune to maintain open structure, feed annually
